thread.section_title: Amigo Loans Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of amigoloans.co.uk
thread.title: Peter

author: Peter
title: Peter
text: Daughter (aged 20) applied for loan and i acted as guarantor ,answered all relevant questions online and also in person over phone ,person over phone seemed very arrogant ,to be honest ,and not very helpful when i asked questions ,this was bfore exmas didnt hear from them for over a month and then only got back when and after daughter rang them ,and they re-contacted me ,could offer no explaination as to why taken so long ,however ,loan was finally approved and paid out within 2 days and most say the second person was very helpful ,got there in the end ,would i use amigo again ,probadly would .
